summary: Emilio has to spend all summer cramming for an exam. He goes to his rich uncle's summer house to concentrate on his studies when some unexpected visitors arrive and make his life a complete living, funny,circus of a nightmare.
cast: Borja Elgea|Roger Pera|Paula Echevarría|María Garralón|Janfri Topera|Mario Arias|Mariví Bilbao|Pablo Rivero|Carmen Vicente-Arche|Miguel Rellán|Jorge Sanz|Jesús Bonilla|Enrique San Francisco|Nathalie Seseña|Rosario Pardo|Javier Collado|Eduardo Gómez|Santiago Nogués|Secun de la Rosa|María Santos|Jose Antonio Bravo|Teresa Ibáñez|Virginia Rodríguez|Vanessa Santos|José Gamo|Joaquín Calderón|Antonio Borrego|Carola Baleztena|Carolina Peinado|Salvador Bueno|Tato Perdiguero|Fernando Méndez-Leite|Boré Buika|Angie Paúl
title: El chocolate del loro
